revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:AFX_SlowFootsteps}}This is one of the [[sound sequence]]s used for ''[[Heretic]]'''s [[ambient sound]]s. Although it is played from {{Class|HereticSoundSequence4}}, it can also be used independently.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_SlowFootsteps environment 3 slot [[HereticAmbience]]
playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb11 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb11 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb11 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playuntildone world/amb11 end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
